messages.content: What is the purpose of tdxh_node_comfyui?
tdxh_node_comfyui provides additional custom nodes for stable diffusion comfyui to help users achieve certain tasks more conveniently using fewer nodes.
To install tdxh_node_comfyui, users need to cd into custom_nodes and then git clone the repo. They may also need to download translator models if using the prompt translator.
What does the TdxhImageToSize node do in tdxh_node_comfyui?
The TdxhImageToSize node in tdxh_node_comfyui can convert an image to a specified size.
What additional functionality does TdxhControlNetProcessor provide compared to standard ControlNet nodes?
TdxhControlNetProcessor adds a switch to ControlNet nodes and allows preprocessing of the image using AUX preprocessor nodes.
How does the TdxhOnOrOff node work in tdxh_node_comfyui?
The TdxhOnOrOff node returns a NUMBER and INT type. When switched to ON, it returns 1, and when switched to OFF, it returns 0.
What is the purpose of the TdxhStringInputTranslator node?
The TdxhStringInputTranslator node returns a STRING type that has been translated. To use this node, users need to download the Translator model.
Which repositories is tdxh_node_comfyui based on?
tdxh_node_comfyui incorporates code from the official ComfyUI repository, was-node-suite-comfyui, and the prompt_translator repository.
